description:
While Luffy and his mates race toward a reunion, Admiral Smoker struggles to survive a heart-stopping showdown with Trafalgar Law!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Collision! Law vs. Vice Admiral Smoker!
Le choc ! Law contre le Vice-amiral Smoker
تصادم! لو ضدّ نائب الأميرال سموكر
激突! ロー VS スモーカー中将
